summary: STEERING COLUMN LOCKS UPON START UP.  THIS IS SECOND OCCURRENCE .  THIS MAKES ALL MOVEMENT EXCEPT IN THE DIRECTION THAT THE FRONT WHEEL WERE LOCKED.  IF THE FRONT WHEELS ARE NOT LOCKED IN THE DIRECTLY FORWARD POSITION, PLACING THE CAR ON A FLAT BED IS NEXT TO IMPOSSIBLE.  A RECALL HAS BEEN ISSUED BUT MY CAR IS NOT WITHIN "THE BREAK POINT RANGE"  SO I WAS NOT ENTITLED TO REDUCED COST REPAIR AND WAS NOT ENTITLED TO THE AVAILABLE INSTALLATION OF THE APPROPRIATE FIX.  *JB  REF. IN EA02-031 *CJS
